sections.heading: tax; appraisement; determination and assessment of tax
sections.text: When the value of the property has been fixed, as provided in section 77-2020 or 77-2021, the county judge shall determine and assess the tax to which the same is liable.SourceLaws 1901, c. 54, ยง 11, p. 418;Laws 1907, c. 104, ยง 1, p. 359;R.S.191
